title: Looking for Gold Top / Support for Clash

embed.description: Real-time LoL Stats! Check your Summoner, MMR, Live Spectate and using powerful global League of Legends Statistics!

body:
Looking for a top and support for tomorrows clash. Anyone chill and has a mic for comms welcome to join. 

Edit: Just add me IGN Trainninja

replies.body: Gold support main if you need one.
